headline: FedEx Targets European Growth With InPost Stake And AI Parcel Automation
summary: FedEx (NYSE:FDX) is leading a consortium to acquire a major stake in Polish parcel delivery company InPost, targeting growth in European B2C and last mile delivery. The company is also working with Berkshire Grey to roll out an AI powered robotic trailer unloader across its shipping network to automate parcel handling. For you as an investor, these updates sit at the intersection of ecommerce growth and logistics automation. FedEx earns most of its revenue from transportation, shipping, and...
